Package ch.nolix.core.validator2

Class ArgumentMediator<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.validator2.ArgumentMediator<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - The type of the argument of a argument mediator.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerMediator, ExtendedArgumentMediator, StringMediator

    public class ArgumentMediator<A>
extends java.lang.Object
    A argument mediator is a mediator for an argument with a name. A argument mediator is not mutable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
